title: Can Christopher Nolan's 'Tenet' Reopen Theaters?
description:
An extraordinary burden has been placed upon 'Tenet.' With a still-unchanged July 17 release date, the Warner Bros. production could be the movie to reopen movie theaters and kick-start Hollywood again. But is it too soon? Many in the industry believe the date will stick and topple a series of dominoes that will affect the movie industry for months and years to come. Sean and Amanda look at the 'Tenet' conundrum from all angles.
Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
